t: JAPAN STORE | AMAZON.COM | MADE IN JAPAN ITEMS
s: Welcome to the JAPAN STORE Explore a range of products made by Japanese companies and artisans. Each item has been carefully selected to highlight Japanese high quality and rich culture. Get started by browsing our categories below and discover the full range.

t: INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING FROM AMAZON.CO.JP - AMAZON CUSTOMER SERVICE
s: Effective from July 1, 2022, real name authentication on Taiwan Customs App, EZ WAY will be mandatory. If consignee has not registered on the EZ WAY or registered phone number is different from the consignee information, import customs clearance may be rejected.

t: JAPAN RABBIT | HOW TO BUY FROM AMAZON JAPAN
s: First, go to amazon.co.jp. Amazon Japan's design is the same as Amazon.com. Except that, at first, everything should be written in Japanese. Thankfully, you can switch the language to English or Chinese by clicking on the globe icon on the main menu. This will auto-translate the website into ...

t: SHOP IN ENGLISH | AMAZON.CO.JP
s: Online shopping from the earth's biggest selection of books, magazines, music, DVDs, videos, electronics, computers, & just about anything else. You'll find items you want to deliver to your home domestically as well as items eligible for international shipping.

t: ABOUT IMPORT FEES DEPOSIT - AMAZON CUSTOMER SERVICE
s: The duty or tax rate is often determined by the classification of a good, which varies by destination. You won't be charged additional fees if the actual Import Fees exceed the Import Fees Deposit we estimated.

t: Tap Into Japan: How to Import from Amazon Japan – The Zelda Zone
s: September 26, 2024 - If you’re only making one purchase ... going to import regularly, it’s a good idea to get a card that pays in yen (this can help on other sites that let you pay in yen instead of USD too). I’m no…credit card…guy, so I’ll leave that aspect of research up to you. At checkout you can confirm your card is paying in Japanese Yen (and change it if it’s not). Amazon Japan is very often the cheapest or pretty close if you can get an item brand new and nowhere ...

t: Amazon Global Japan: International Shipping Made Easy
s: Amazon Global enables International users to shop on amazon.co.jp in English or in Chinese. Here you could find the most popular and coolest Japanese items and ship purchases to over 65 countries around the world.

t: About International Shipping - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon.co.jp. gladly accepts orders of certain product lines to international addresses. There are two types of delivery options for international shipping.

t: Sell on Amazon in Japan | Amazon Global Selling

t: International Shipping Terms & Conditions - Amazon Customer Service
s: Each item in your order is sold by Amazon Japan G.K. ("Amazon”) or the merchant that the item is specified as sold by ("Merchant"). Those items for shipment to countries outside of Japan may be subject to taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country ("Import Fees").
